description:
Agile is the proven and most popular Project Methodology for most of todayâ€™s IT projects.

The popularity of Agile has made agile certification in popular demand, and this course will teach everything you need to start becoming Agile.

The course will also provide you with details about how YOU can become Certified in Agile.

The course is specifically aimed at everyone who are interested in becoming Agile and certified in Agile.

The Course will answer the following questions:

  • What is Agile?
  • Why you should become Agile?
  • What is the Agile Mindset and Manifesto?
  • What are the Agile Methodologies?
  • How can you become Certified in Agile?

The course structure

  • What is Agile
  • Why to become Agile
  • The Agile Mindset
  • The Agile Manifesto
  • The Four Values of Agile
  • The Twelve Principles of Agile
  • The Agile Methodologies
  • Agile Certifications

Start your Agile career today!
title: Introduction to Agile and Agile Certification
